chapters.title: Chapter 15:  A Different Skill
chapters.info:
Ispan Shefar,
      p. 348â€”Aes
      Sedai of the Black Ajah, formerly of the Blue.  She grew up in Tarabon,
      and has dark hair.  She was captured by Nynaeve
      in the Rahad.  Elayne recovered a silver ring worked in
      braided spirals from her; it allows the bearer to enter
      Tel'aran'rhiod by channeling Spirit into it.  Ispan was executed,
      messily, along with her interrogator Adeleas.  The murderer
      was either Careane or Sareitha.
Chapter 16:  The New Follower
